div.div: NPUSC will be closed from March 16th through the end of the 2019 – 2020 school year as a precaution due to the COVID-19 Coronavirus.
—- See the letter below under the latest news —-

iframe.title: Wecome to New Prairie United School Corporation

h3.a: NPUSC buildings are Closed from March 16th through the end of the 2019 – 2020 school year

div.p: Dear NPUSC Family, This follow up is the latest information I have related to our school program due to COVID-19 concerns. Governor Holcomb announced yesterday that Indiana schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year but will be expected to complete 160 Instructional Days. Counting the nine E-Learning Days we have used […]

NPUSC school buildings will be closed from March 16th through the end of the 2019 - 2020 school year as a precaution due to the COVID-19 Coronavirus. We will continue eLearning on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday with the last eLearning day on Thursday, May 14th.

ul.li:
March 16, 2020
NPUSC will be closed from March 16th to April 3rd as a precaution due to the COVID-19 Coronavirus

div.p: Surplus Textbooks (*Taxpayers have the right to claim one copy of each prior to September 5th*)
